def_cn: (与形容词连用)表示“性格…的”，“有…精神的”
def_en: See also:high-spirited; public-spirited; -spirited combines with adjectives to describe a person's character, attitude, or behaviour. For example, a mean-spirited person behaves in a way that is unkind to other people; a free-spirited person behaves freely and does as they please.
